text: The Angolan Roller Hockey SuperCup aka Supertaça João Garcia is an annual handball competition between the winners of the previous year's league champion and cup. In case the same team happens to win both the league and the cup, the match will be played between the league winner and the cup runner-up. ==Scores== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align: center;" |- bgcolor=#c1d8ff !rowspan=1 width=55px|Year !rowspan=1 width=55px|City !rowspan=1 width=75px|Date !width=5px rowspan=15 bgcolor=ffffff| !colspan=3|Score |- bgcolor=#d0e7ff |2005 | Luanda | Feb 26 |width=135px|Juventude de Viana |width=75px|5–1 |width=135px|Petro de Luanda |- |2006 | Luanda | Jan 25 |Petro de Luanda |8–5 |Desportivo da Banca |- bgcolor=#d0e7ff |2007 |colspan=2| |colspan=3|not played |- |2008 | Luanda |Mar 19 |Juventude de Viana |3–2 |Petro de Luanda |- bgcolor=#d0e7ff |2009 | Luanda |Feb 07 |Petro de Luanda |3–2 |Juventude de Viana |- |2010 |Luanda |Mar 07 |Académica de Luanda |5–2 |Juventude de Viana |- bgcolor=#d0e7ff |2011 | | |Juventude de Viana |– |Académica de Luanda |- |2012 |Luanda |Apr 27 |Petro de Luanda |3–2 |Juventude de Viana |-bgcolor=#d0e7ff |2013 | |Mar 9/10 |Académica de Luanda |7–26–4 |Petro de Luanda |- |2014 |Malanje |Mar 29/30 |Juventude de Viana |2–13–2 |Académica de Luanda |-bgcolor=#d0e7ff |2015 |Luanda |Apr 16 |Académica de Luanda |7–2 |Petro de Luanda |- |2016 |Luanda |July 1 |Académica de Luanda |4–2 |Primeiro de Agosto |-bgcolor=#d0e7ff |2017 |Luanda |Mar 25 |Académica de Luanda |6–5 (pen) |Primeiro de Agosto |} == Titles by team == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" |- !
